label: The date that inspection was actually carried out by energy assessor
description: The date that the inspection was actually carried out by the energy assessor.

label: Age band when building part constructed
The building type of address
description: The building type of the property, e.g., Detached, Semi-Detached, Terrace, etc..Together with the Property Type, the Build Form produces a structured description of the property.

label: The property type of address
description: Describes the type of property such as House, Flat, Maisonette etc. This is the type differentiator for dwellings.

label: Floor level relative to lowest level of property \(0 for ground floor\)
description: Floor level relative to the lowest level of the property (0 for ground floor). If there is a basement, the basement is level 0 and the other floors are from 1 upwards. Measure only availabe for flats and maisonettes.

label: The number of storeys in apartment block.
description: The number of storeys in the apartment block.

label: Whether flat is on top storey. Measure availabe for flats only
description: Whether the flat is on the top storey. Measure availabe for flats only.

label: Total m2 of all enclosed spaces measured to internal face of external walls
description: The total useful floor area in square meter is the total of all enclosed spaces measured to the internal face of the external walls, i.e., the gross floor area as measured in accordance with the guidance issued from time to time by the Royal Institute of Chartered Surveyors or by a body replacing that institution.

label: Mean height of storey in metres.
description: Average height of the storey in metres.

label: Number of heated rooms in property if > half of habitable rooms are not heated
description: The number of heated rooms in the property if more than half of the habitable rooms are not heated.

label: Number of rooms used/intended to be used for sleeping/living
description: Habitable rooms include any living room, sitting room, dining room, bedroom, study and similar; and also a non-separated conservatory. A kitchen/diner having a discrete seating area (with space for a table and four chairs) also counts as a habitable room. A non-separated conservatory adds to the habitable room count if it has an internal quality door between it and the dwelling. Excluded from the room count are any room used solely as a kitchen, utility room, bathroom, cloakroom, en-suite accommodation and similar and any hallway, stairs or landing; and also any room not having a window.

label: The number of extensions added to property
description: The number of extensions added to the property.

label: Ranged estimate of total glazed area of habitable area
description: Ranged estimate of the total glazed area of the habitable area.

label: The type of glazing, using Fenestration Rating Council\/manufacturer declaration
description: The type of glazing, using British Fenestration Rating Council or manufacturer declaration.

label: Current estimated total energy consumption for property inkWh/m²
description: Current estimated total energy consumption for the property in a 12-month period in kilowatt hours per square metre (kWh/m²).

label: Estimated potential total energy consumption for property inkWh/m²
description: Estimated potential total energy consumption for the property in a 12-month period in kilowatt hours per square metre (kWh/m²).

label: Current estimated annual energy costs for hot water in GBP
description: Current estimated annual energy costs for hot water in GBP.

label: Current estimated annual energy costs for heating property in GBP
description: Current estimated annual energy costs for heating the property in GBP.

label: Current estimated annual energy costs for lighting property in GBP
description: Current estimated annual energy costs for lighting the property in GBP.

label: The potential energy efficiency rating of property.
description: The potential energy efficiency rating of the property.

label: Energy used for heating, water and lighting multiplied by fuel costs \(£m2year\)
description: Energy efficiency based on cost of energy, i.e. energy required for space heating, water heating and lighting (in kWh/year) multiplied by fuel costs. (£/m²/year where cost is derived from kWh).

label: Estimated potential energy rating converted into a linear 'A to G' rating
description: Estimated potential energy rating converted into a linear 'A to G' rating (where A is the most energy efficient and G is the least energy efficient).

label: Current energy rating converted into a linear 'A to G' rating
description: Current energy rating converted into a linear 'A to G' rating (where A is the most energy efficient and G is the least energy efficient).

label: Type of transaction that triggered assessment
description: Type of transaction that triggered assessment.

label: Describes tenure type of property
description: Describes the tenure type of the property.

label: Size of building footprint of building containing home address in m2
description: Size of the building footprint of the building containing the home address in square meters.

label: Height of building containing home address in meters
description: Height of the building containing the home address in meters.

label: Volume of building containing home address in cubic m2
description: Volume of the building containing the home address in cubic square meters.

label: Floor area of building containing home address in m2
description: Floor area of the building containing the home address in square meters.

label: Floor-space index (FSI) of block containing home address
description: Floor-space index (FSI) of the block containing the home address.

label: Ground-space index (GSI) of block containing home address
description: Ground-space index (GSI) of the block containing the home address.

label: Open-space ratio (OSR) of block containing home address
description: Open-space ratio (OSR) of the block containing the home address.

label: Mean building layers of floors (L) of block containing home address
description: Average building layers of floors (L) of the block containing the home address.

label: Size of block containing home address in m2
description: Size of the block containing the home address in square meters.

label: Sum of all building footprints within block containing home address in m2
description: Sum of all building footprints within the block containing the home address in square meters.

label: Mean height of all buildings within block containing home address in meters
description: Average height of all buildings within the block containing the home address in meters.

label: Sum of floor area within block containing home address in m2
description: Sum of floor area within the block containing the home address in square meters.

label: Sum of volume of all buildings within block containing home address in m2
description: Sum of volume of all buildings within the block containing the home address in square meters.

label: Volume density of block containing home address in m2
description: Volume density of the block containing the home address in square meters.
